subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The freshman Kalin Lucas scored a career-high 18 points, including an acrobatic layup to ignite a key first-half run, to lead No. 9 Michigan State to a 78-72 victory against No. 4 Texas on Saturday night in Auburn Hills, Mich.
snippet: The freshman Kalin Lucas scored a career-high 18 points, including an acrobatic layup to ignite a key first-half run, to lead No. 9 Michigan State to a 78-72 victory against No. 4 Texas on Saturday night in Auburn Hills, Mich.
